send(Action) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.client.ConnectionSocket
Method send forwards a new action to the server, encapsulating the object in a SerializedMessage type unpacked and read later by the server.
send(Message) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.client.ConnectionSocket
Method send forwards a new message to the server, encapsulating the object in a SerializedMessage type unpacked and read later by the server.
send(Answer) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.VirtualClient
Method send prepares the answer for sending it through the network, putting it in a serialized package, called SerializedMessage, then sends the packaged answer to the transmission protocol, located in the socket-client handler.
sendAll(Answer) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.GameHandler
Method sendAll sends an incoming packaged message to all the clients connected to the game.
sendAll(Answer) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.VirtualClient
Method sendAll sends the message to all playing clients, thanks to the GameHandler sendAll method.
sendAllExcept(Answer, int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.GameHandler
Method sendAllExcept sends an incoming packaged message to all the clients connected to the game, except the excluded one.
sendSocketMessage(SerializedAnswer) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.SocketClientConnection
Method sendSocketMessage allows dispatching the server's Answer to the correct client.
sendVictory(String) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.GameHandler
Method sendVictory send the win message to the player that has won, and to the other players that they have lost.
SerializedAnswer - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.server.answers
Class SerializedAnswer is an Answer that can be serialized.

Server - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.server
Server class is the main one of the server side, it allows clients to connect, play together and also starts the match.
Server() - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.server.Server
Constructor Server creates the instance of the server, based on a socket and the mapping between VirtualClient, nicknames and client ids.

ServerMessageHandler class handles the answers from the server notifying the correct part of the GUI or CLI through property change listeners.
